message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm looking to sell it to you for $200. Is that something you're interested in?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I was hoping to stay within a budget of $150 for this purchase. Would you be able to accommodate that?

I understand that you have a budget constraint, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I can offer you a compromise at $180, which is still a good deal considering the value of the product. Is that something you'd be interested in?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $165 for the product. I hope this aligns better with what you're able to offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as low as $165. I can offer you a slightly higher price at $190, which is closer to my minimum price. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I am unable to meet you at $190 given my budget constraints. I am willing to pay up to $170 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your considerations.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer you a price of $185, which is a bit higher than your last offer. Is this something you'd be willing to accept?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Given my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $180 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your considerations.
I'm almost at my minimum price, Bob. I can offer you a price of $195, which is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
